content:
03091b287af5419c97f8f64:
  'capability description': Addresses concerns about the device's display, such as flickering,
    discoloration, or unresponsiveness.
  'capability name': Screen Issues
  'attribute':
  - 'attribute description': The brand of the phone experiencing screen issues.
    'identifier': cf060786969341f49ad0209
    'attribute name': phone_brand
  - 'attribute description': The specific model of the phone experiencing screen issues.
    'identifier': add982d91c384726945a99b
    'attribute name': phone_model
  - 'attribute description': The type of screen issue being experienced.
    'identifier': 60916b45dc2a4c6290b2fa8
    'attribute name': screen_issue
062fd8943e0744d9ae01625:
  'capability description': Indicates the device's battery is excessively hot, which
    can be a safety concern and reduce battery life.
  'capability name': Battery Overheat
  'attribute':
  - 'attribute description': The brand of the phone experiencing overheating.
    'identifier': 05c920ad454d4aa39b9d023
    'attribute name': phone_brand
    'attribute possible values':
    - Apple
    - Samsung
    - Google
    - LG
    - Sony
    - OnePlus
    - Xiaomi
    - Huawei
  - 'attribute description': The specific model of the phone experiencing overheating.
    'identifier': 652637109ffd42bcb50425a
    'attribute name': phone_model
  - 'attribute description': The temperature of the environment where the phone is located.
    'identifier': 0ae6f5a384ba460d9e5f378
    'attribute name': environment_temperature
  - 'attribute description': The current battery percentage of the phone.
    'identifier': fa92e4f0dd774e7eb8634fa
    'attribute name': charge_level
    'attribute possible values':
    - 0-20%
    - 21-40%
    - 41-60%
    - 61-80%
    - 81-100%
  - 'attribute description': Whether the phone is currently charging or discharging.
    'identifier': 1e79e3d932744a629813eb2
    'attribute name': charging_status
202637d7478349e5be99ea1:
  'capability description': Refers to issues or disruptions in the device's ability
    to connect to networks or other devices.
  'capability name': Connectivity Troubles
  'attribute':
  - 'attribute description': The specific model of the phone users are having trouble
      with.
    'identifier': 07818cce9b0d43d7ad65f33
    'attribute name': phone_model
  - 'attribute description': The type of connectivity that is causing issues.
    'identifier': 09ffb84c0d7c4763bea5e4a
    'attribute name': connectivity_type
    'attribute possible values':
    - Wi-Fi
    - Bluetooth
    - Cellular
    - Mobile Hotspot
  - 'attribute description': A brief description of the connectivity issue.
    'identifier': d5db07b76e8b41c7ac8b4a2
    'attribute name': issue_description
a66741564ce64f27b45ca13:
  'capability description': Refers to the device's battery losing charge faster than
    expected, often due to background apps or screen brightness.
  'capability name': Battery Drain
  'attribute':
  - 'attribute description': The brand of the phone for which the battery drain is being
      diagnosed.
    'identifier': 057568e65ba04a0d9065a63
    'attribute name': phone_brand
  - 'attribute description': The specific model of the phone for which the battery drain
      is being diagnosed.
    'identifier': e6e26e5f42b74b41afc3cc9
    'attribute name': phone_model
    'attribute possible values':
    - Galaxy S21
    - iPhone 13
    - Pixel 6
    - V30
    - 8T
    - Xperia 1 III
    - Moto G Power
    - Mi 11
    - Find X3 Pro
    - X70 Pro
  - 'attribute description': The symptoms of the battery drain issue.
    'identifier': a8cf2b64b57a4f379c68aee
    'attribute name': battery_drain_symptoms
c0d26f52b5f44fae8abca8c:
  'capability description': Describes any issues related to the device's battery life
    or performance.
  'capability name': Battery Problems
  'attribute':
  - 'attribute description': The brand of the phone having battery problems.
    'identifier': 36b689f69ca341fe860ba18
    'attribute name': phone_brand
  - 'attribute description': The specific model of the phone having battery problems.
    'identifier': d66bf74fff114ead87f3523
    'attribute name': phone_model
    'attribute possible values':
    - iPhone 12
    - Galaxy S21
    - Pixel 5
    - V60
    - Xperia 1 II
    - Edge+
  - 'attribute description': The nature of the battery problem.
    'identifier': 0c7498459d4645ea9c3cab4
    'attribute name': battery_issue
